import { useState } from "react"; function IntrinsicValue() { const [netProfit, newNetProfit] = useState("0"); const [depAndAmort, newDepAndAmort] = useState("0"); const [increaseInWC, newIncreaseINWC] = useState("0"); const [capitalExpenditure, newCapitalExpenditure] = useState("0"); const [debtRepayment, newDebtRepayment] = useState("0"); const [debtRaised, newDebtRaised] = useState("0"); const [numOfShares, newNumOfShares] = useState("0"); const [rateOfReturn, newRateOfReturn] = useState("0"); const [fcfeGrowth, newFcfeGrowth] = useState("0"); var fcfeY1 = parseFloat(netProfit) + parseFloat(depAndAmort) - parseFloat(increaseInWC) - parseFloat(capitalExpenditure) - parseFloat(debtRepayment) + parseFloat(debtRaised); const projectedFCFE = []; const calculateIntrinsicValue = () => { let intrinsicValue = 0; for (let index = 1; index <= 5; index++) { intrinsicValue += (projectedFCFE[index - 1].value / Math.pow(1 + rateOfReturn / 100, index)); } return intrinsicValue + (projectedFCFE[4].value.toFixed(2) * (1 / (rateOfReturn / 100))) / Math.pow(1 + (rateOfReturn / 100),5) }; for (let index = 1; index <= 5; index++) { projectedFCFE.push({ label: `${index}`, value: fcfeY1 * Math.pow(1 + fcfeGrowth / 100, index - 1), }); } return ( <> Invesfe
{projectedFCFE.map(({ label, value }) => ( ))}
Year Projected FCFE
{label} ${value.toFixed(2)}
); } export default IntrinsicValue;
